snippet: Ann Romney has become much more visible on the stump in support of her husband, Mitt Romney, now that he has clinched the Republican presidential nomination.
abstract: Ann Romney has become much more visible on the stump in support of her husband, Mitt Romney, now that he has clinched the Republican presidential nomination; Romney's campaign has begun making her available for news media interviews and has surrounded her with minders to help her withstand the increasing scrutiny

byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Ann Romney has become much more visible on the stump in support of her husband, Mitt Romney, now that he has clinched the Republican presidential nomination.

headline.seo: At Romney’s Side, a Determined Running Mate
headline.main: At Romney’s Side, a Determined Running Mate
headline.print_headline: At Romney’s Side, a Determined Running Mate
